procedural_fairness: adequate notice before denying an application
proof of sending is sufficient unless circumstances suggest otherwise
evidence_provided: March 27 letter sent to correct address via regular mail
CAIPS notes and a copy in the file
Applicant's consultant did not receive it but provided no evidence of system reliability
decision_outcome: Officer fulfilled the duty of procedural fairness by proving the notice was sent
cause_of_action: permanent residency application denied due to non-receipt of requested documents
judicial_authority: Court dismissed the application, upholding CIC's decision
